Package implementations

Class MyArrayList<E>

java.lang.Object
implementations.MyArrayList<E>
Type Parameters:
E - the type of elements in this list
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, ListADT<E>
public class MyArrayList<E> extends Object implements ListADT<E>
A custom implementation of a resizable array-based list. This class implements the ListADT interface.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MyArrayList()
    Constructs an empty list with an initial capacity of 10.
